body:
My ban appeal has been denied, so this will probably be the last time I talk to all of you, unless I feel the need to communicate more on the forums.
Because there are 50 USD on my account (I have an emerald rank), I don't want all of that money to go to waste, so I wish to give it to my friend please (vladthesexy100).
I don't know if you can do this anymore, but I don't all of this money to be on an account that is no longer going to be in use.
If possible, please contact me over skype (A manager or someone who can do this for me).
body_tagged:
My ban appeal has been denied, so this will probably be the last time I talk to all of you, unless I feel the need to communicate more on the forums.

I don't know if you can do this anymore, but I don't all of this money to be on an account that is no longer going to be in use.
If possible, please contact me over skype (A manager or someone who can do this for me).

replies.body:
Also, no, I will not be showing the video.

It is between Porky and the staff, this is not a community issue. I know you guys care about Porky a lot as a friend, and I understand that, but a video like that is confidential, it is kept that way to protect the reputation of the player who recorded the video (whom I was in-game with) and the reputation of Porky as well.
replies.body_tagged:
Also, no, I will not be showing the video.

It is between Porky and the staff, this is not a community issue. I know you guys care about Porky a lot as a friend, and I understand that, but a video like that is confidential, it is kept that way to protect the reputation of the player who recorded the video (whom I was in-game with) and the reputation of Porky as well.
